attributes.action: Cancel GCSE'S as coronavirus could be at its peak during this time
attributes.background: We would like to ask to cancel GCSE'S as the virus could be at its peak during this time and also could cause students to become worried and therefore could put them off their exams

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
